titleStmt.title: A parænesis. Or, Seasonable exhortatory to all true sons of the Church of England. Wherein is inserted a discourse of hæresy in defence of our Church against the Romanist. / By H. Hammond. D.D.
titleStmt.author: Hammond, Henry, 1605-1660.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R.N. for Richard Royston, at the Angel in Ivie-Lane.,

notesStmt.note: With two final advertisement and errata leaves.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
